recipesJson.name: Strawberry Dreaming
recipesJson.author: BobbyB01
recipesJson.description: I have been working on this recipe for about 2 months and I think I've nailed it.I wanted it to tast like the real strawberry ice cream not the cheap crap we're you get the sweet strawberry ice cream with the real strawberry running through it and I think this is it.Make sure you steep this recipe for a minimum of 3-4 days to allow the strawberry to blend with the creams and to allow the Fuji to bring it all together.

reviews.text: I enjoyed the richness of the cream layer, and the mix of strawberries suited it perfectly.
